Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/30/0x91c92f8bd1e17801edacad6b943e20c1777ee754.sol#592-621) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/30/0x91c92f8bd1e17801edacad6b943e20c1777ee754.sol#607-621)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/30/0x91c92f8bd1e17801edacad6b943e20c1777ee754.sol#605-621)
